subject: Question after purchase
description_text:
Good day!

I recently purchased Simsonn pro X pedals from alibaba.com. 
I found out that it is the model with only 2 elastomers (yes it was my fault, I was searching for the pro X ultra with 3 elastomers but kinda got stuck searching for the lowest price and forgot to really look what I bought). 

So now for my question, is there a possibility to buy and upgrade the (brake) pedal to have 3 elastomers? I guess I need to buy another iron spacer/plate for in between the elastomers and some new elastomers? 
Do you guys have some more idea’s or suggestions for upgrades to the 2 elastomer pedals? 

Thanks in advance,
With kind regards, 
Xavier van Heerden

conversations.body_text: Hi Xavier van heerden,     We offer an upgrade link for the Pro X Ultra, which you can purchase directly from our official website.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-x-ultra-pedals-upgrade-kit
